k = 7 - length of string 
r = 5 - # of repetition for full string


gabc,defg,abcd,efga,bcde,fgab,cdef,gabc,defg
0102,0102,0102,0102,0102,0102,0102,0102,0102
00110022,0011002,2001100,2200110,0220011

gabcdef gabcdef gabcdef gabcdef gabcdef g (6M)
0000000 1111111 0000000 2222222 0000000 1 x7
0000000 0111111 1100000 0002222 2222000 0 x8
0000000 0011111 1111000 0000002 2222222 2
